Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Beverly Nelson admitted to forging the entire yearbook note from Roy Moore, when in fact she only added the date and location.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or admission from Beverly Nelson that she forged the yearbook note.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that because Nelson added the date and location, she must have forged the entire note, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Nelson added the date and location to remind herself of who Roy Moore was and when the incident occurred, rather than forging the entire note.
